00027 #ifndef _CONFIG_H
00028 #define _CONFIG_H
00029 
00030 /* used for libtimer, maximum available timers which can run simutanusly*/
00031 #define CONFIG_NUM_TIMERS 4
00032 
00033 /* use the console interface for communication with the application */
00034 #define CONFIG_CONSOLE 1
00035 
00036 /* allow some printf output during program execution */
00037 #define CONFIG_PRINTF 1
00038 
00039 /* size in char of the USART's input queue */
00040 #define CONFIG_CONSOLE_QUEUE_SIZE (16)
00041 
00042 /* size in char of the maximal printf line */
00043 #define CONFIG_PRINTF_LINE_SIZE (80)
00044 
00045 /* size in char of the maximal console line */
00046 #define CONFIG_CONSOLE_LINE_SIZE (80)
00047 
00048 /* select the time between to nanoNET TRX chip recalibrations in ms */
00049 #define CONFIG_NTRX_RECAL_DELAY (6000)
00050 
00051 /* select the time between last packet and timeout indication in ms */
00052 #define CONFIG_NTRX_PHY_RX_TIMEOUT (5000)
00053 
00054 /* version.revision number of the firmware */
00055 #define CONFIG_REG_MAP_NR (501)
00056 /* use only necessary shadow registers */
00057 // #define CONFIG_NTRX_NO_SREG 1
00058 
00059 /* use leds for tx/rx indication */
00060 #define CONFIG_TRAFFIC_LED 1
00061 
00062 /* use led for recalibration indication */
00063 #define CONFIG_RECALIB_LED 1
00064 // #define CONFIG_USE_TX_LED 1
00065 #define CONFIG_USE_RX_LED 1
00066 #define CONFIG_USE_ERR_LED 1
00067 #define CONFIG_USE_CAL_LED 1
00068 
00069 /* set clock for uart */
00070 #define F_CPU 7372800
00071 #define CONFIG_CLK_73_MHZ 1
00072 // #define FCPU 8000000
00073 // #define CONFIG_CLK_80_MHZ 1
00074 
00075 /* use auto recalibration */
00076 #define CONFIG_NTRX_AUTO_RECALIB 1
00077 
00078 /* use when external power amplifier is present */
00079 #define CONFIG_NTRX_RF_TX_EXT_PAMP_OUT 1
00080 
00081 /* use syncword */
00082 #define CONFIG_DEFAULT_SYNCWORD {0xab,0x69,0xca,0x94,0x92,0xd5,0x2c,0xab}
00083 
00084 #include <avr/pgmspace.h>
00085 #define ReadRomByte(p) pgm_read_byte(&(p))
00086 #define ReadRomWord(p) pgm_read_word(&(p))
00087 
00088 /* All available trx modes */

00090 #define CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_2000NS  1
00091 #define CONFIG_NTRX_22MHZ_4000NS  1
00092 #define CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_500NS   1
00093 #define CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_1000NS  1
00094 #define CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_2000NS  1
00095 #define CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_4000NS  1
00096 // #define CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_22MHZ_1000NS 1
00097 // #define CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_22MHZ_2000NS 1
00098 // #define CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_22MHZ_4000NS 1
00099 // #define CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_500NS  1
00100 #define CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_1000NS 1
00101 // #define CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_2000NS 1
00102 // #define CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_4000NS 1

00104         && !defined (CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_22MHZ_2000NS) \
00105         && !defined (CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_22MHZ_4000NS) \
00106         && !defined (CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_500NS) \
00107         && !defined (CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_1000NS) \
00108         && !defined (CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_2000NS) \
00109         && !defined (CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_4000NS))
00110 #ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_80MHZ_1000NS
00111 #define CONFIG_DEFAULT_TRX_80MHZ_1000NS 1
00112 #warning No default mode set. Set to 80Mhz 1us!
00113 #else
00114 #error Please select a default mode in config.h

00116 #endif
